body_html:
Closing to wait for @apaszke to improve separation of fusion pass and fusion compiler. Plan is for fusion pass to be outside the fuser. Huzzah! Also, we will create a "directory" for code overlap between the cpu and CUDA fusers in the updated PR. Though the fusers may diverge later, while they share common code it may as well actually be shared.

fyi @ngimel

body:
Closing to wait for @apaszke to improve separation of fusion pass and fusion compiler. Plan is for fusion pass to be outside the fuser. Huzzah! Also, we will create a "directory" for code overlap between the cpu and CUDA fusers in the updated PR. Though the fusers may diverge later, while they share common code it may as well actually be shared. 

fyi @ngimel
